item.title: HORSES launches December 2
item.content:encoded:
• PC

First-person horror adventure from Santa Ragione.

First-person horror adventure game HORSES will launch for PC via Epic Games Store, GOG, itch.io, and Humble Store on December 2, developer Santa Ragione announced. It will not be available on Steam, as the game was banned from the platform without a detailed explanation by Valve.

Here is an overview of the game, via Santa Ragione:

About

An enigmatic first-person horror adventure that blurs the line between reality and the darkest corners of your imagination. Fourteen days, a horse farm, and a few rules to follow.

Take a break from your college coursework and spend the summer helping out on a secluded farm.

The air is warm, the horses are quiet, and the people are down-to-earth. Each day brings new tasks, and the work itself is simple, even if the goals are a little unclear. Sometimes, after the sun sets on a productive day, there are even activities to be found in the evenings.

Over the course of fourteen days, it welcomes you into encounters that test your obedience, complicity, and restraint.

Key Features

  • Immerse yourself in the eerie fusion of gameplay and full-motion video intermissions.
  • Witness the farm’s unspeakable horrors through daily unique interactions.
  • Heed the farmer’s warnings or face consequences (?)
  • Withstand 14 days of spiraling dread as the reality of the farm unfolds.
  • A full playthrough lasts three to four hours.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Five Hearts Under One Roof – FMV romance returns with more heroines, routes, and emotions
item.content:encoded:
• Sponsored

Who will stay by your side?

The full-motion video romance sim Five Hearts Under One Roof is back—available now for PC via Steam—picking up Yuman’s story as he once again finds himself running a boarding house that’s anything but ordinary. This new season brings more heroines, more branching paths, and more chances to get tangled up in the emotions of everyone living under the same roof.

Old faces Mal-sook, Gran, and Min-jung return, joined by newcomers Yu-na, Yoo-jung, and Gyu-ri. Each one shifts the atmosphere of the house in their own way. Paired with upgraded visuals, a smoother progression flow, and a few added systems that shake up how each route unfolds, season2 aims to deliver a more approachable and more engaging experience than the original.

Returning Favorites and New Heroines Join the Boarding House

Mal-sook Go

Yuman’s first tenant and a childhood friend he’s known for 20 years. She jokes that he’s “under her control,” but there’s something she’s been hiding from him—something she still can’t bring herself to say.

Gran Dong

The second tenant and Yuman’s supervisor at work. Gran lives and breathes her job, brushing off anything that isn’t work-related. The one exception is Yuman, who she watches more closely than she admits. She even asks him to drop the “Manager” title when they’re off the clock.

Yu-na Jeong

The third tenant and the youngest daughter of a major conglomerate family. Outgoing and cheerful on the surface, she’s labeled the “useless” one at home, and the trouble she causes pushes her into Yuman’s boarding house.

Min-jung Park

The fourth tenant and Yuman’s first love. After rising from an overlooked idol to a national sweetheart, a sudden scandal threatens to derail it all. With nowhere else to turn, she finds her way back to Yuman’s boarding house.

Yoo-jung Yang

The last tenant is a quiet girl who throws herself into work. Past bullying makes it hard for her to face others, and she’s been postponing college because of it. Yuman becomes the first person to truly acknowledge her for who she is.

Gyu-ri Bang

A nurse known for her warmth and dedication. Patients adore her, but lately she’s been catching herself thinking about Yuman in ways that go beyond professional concern. It’s only a matter of time before she edges closer to becoming a tenant herself.

Expanded Narrative Paths and Improved Immersion

season2 is once again shot fully from Yuman’s perspective, pulling players directly into the conversations, choices, and emotional moments. The video team behind the first season returns, this time with more natural performances and cleaner cinematography.

New epilogues, hidden routes, and additional interactive elements give players more ways to shape each heroine’s storyline. Bonus scenes and fresh branches also encourage multiple playthroughs for players who want to see every path unfold.

A Deeper Focus on Character Growth

This season takes time to show how each heroine has changed since the last. Some face new challenges, others find their confidence shifting, and a few are grappling with complicated feelings toward Yuman. These developments play into how each route moves forward, adding new layers to relationships that began in the first season.

As everyone grows in their own way, the boarding house becomes a place where old emotions, new tensions, and unresolved moments collide, shaping the connections that form throughout the story.

A House Full of Unforgettable Romance

With a larger cast, expanded story routes, and refined presentation, Five Hearts Under One Roof season2 brings players another round of heartfelt full-motion video drama. Every heroine offers a different emotional experience, and every decision nudges Yuman toward a different ending.

As relationships take shape and stories deepen, who will stay by your side?

Five Hearts Under One Roof is available now for PC via Steam.
